summary: I am a co-founder of Reprex, a company that is trying to automate business, scientific and policy research workflows from data acquisition to presentation.  We want to make estimation, forecasting, valuation and predictive models from econometrics, corporate finance, and machine learning available in fragmented and vulnerable industries like music, film, book, photography and ecotech.  https://reprex.nl/#about

certifications.name: Building Web Applications in R with Shiny Course
edX Verified Certificate for The Analytics Edge

Public Administration Certificate

certifications.name: Manipulating Time Series Data in R with xts

projects.title: iotables
projects.description: Starting from various creative industry economic impact analysis calculation I created an open source R software package that downloads recent Eurostat data, pre-processes them, and performs various economic impact calculations on the gross value added, national economy, investments, tax base, etc. It creates the multipliers, indicators needed for such studies, or for use as KPIs.  This is data science, part economics, part statistics, part programming.

projects.title: Central & Eastern European Music Industry Report 2020
projects.description: The results of the first Hungarian, Slovak, Croatian and Czech music industry reports are compared with Armenian, Austrian, Bulgarian, Lithuanian, Serbian and Slovenian data and findings. Demand and supply of music, how music markets work, what are the price and quantity developments. Availability of grants.  Policy issues: local content, taxation, value transfer, valuation, music export.

projects.title: A ProArt zeneipari jelentése 2015 - ProArt Music Industry Report 2015 [Hungary]
projects.description: Hungary's first music industry report. Following the three income streams model from creation till audience, we summerized for the the number of works that were created, recorded, staged in Hungary in a year. We calculated their revenues, their value added, their employment effect and the investments of the recording industry. There is an extensive business development and policy conclusions chapter in the 143-pages report, which is the first in a series about the Central European music industry.

projects.title: Economic analysis and tariff review of private copying remuneration
projects.description: An economic analysis of the evolution of private copying, its benefits for the Hungarian households and the equitable remuneration for music and film copyright and neighboring right owners. Review of the technological and regulatory evolution of the PCR regime in Europe.

projects.title: Online publishing (EU news and policy analysis)
projects.description: Via a small fund managed by Visegrad Investments acquisition and management of the online media publisher for EurActiv.hu, in the company Media Activ Kft. Even though the company was profitable, EurActiv decided to pull out from Hungary's troubled media environment.

contributors.headline: Data Analyst at NXP Semiconductors, Future of Finance Team

projects.title: AmCham Position Brief 'Energy Policy as a Pillar of Hungarian National Competitiveness'
projects.description:
Preparing, negotiating, discussing and presenting policy brief 'Energy Policy as a Pillar of Hungarian National Competitiveness' for the incoming government for the largest international investor chamber in Hungary about power generation, energy infrastructure, distribution, subsidies and mining. 
http://www.amcham.hu/download/001/181/Energy-Positin-Brief-_ENG-Final.pdf

projects.title: Market sizing: The market of re-usable public sector information in Hungary
projects.description:
A localization of "Measuring European Public Sector Information Resources" for Hungary in the fields of 1. Business information, 2. Geographic information 3. Legal information 4. Meteorological information 5. Social data and 6. Transport information. Market sizing, service levels, pricing.
At the time of the study the our company was still called ITCB Consulting, referring to our original mother company.

contributors.headline: Data Analyst at NXP Semiconductors, Future of Finance Team

projects.title: Commissioner for Rail Regulation
projects.description:
As a Commissioner I was responsible for preparing a policy document on opening the Hungarian railway market, drafting a legislative proposal for the government and helping legislation. I was also responsible to set up a railway regulatory body to license new entrants and provide discrimination-free access to Hungary's railway network. This project concluded with the adoption of the Act on Railway Transport (2005.183).
http://net.jogtar.hu/jr/gen/hjegy_doc.cgi?docid=A0500183.TV

projects.title: Jelentés a Fejlesztéspolitikáról 1993-2003 / Ex post evaluation of Hungary’s domestic and EU-assisted public investments
projects.description: During the set up of an ex ante, interim and ex post evaluation and economy unit within the National Development Agency, I was a senior consultant and trainer to this report that aimed at providing a comprehensive analysis of Hungary’s EU accession path. My role in this project was to apply EU evaluation skills gained in the pre-accession (ISPA, Phare) phase and the development of Hungary’s Preliminary National Development Plan earlier, and help indentify, collect, interpret and analyze data sources in various governmental agencies.

profile_positions.description:
We would like to make the benefits of highly automated, reproducible research workflows for research & development intensive micro-, small- and medium sized companies, particularly in the creative, cultural and copyright-based industries that do not have in-house data science and data engineering teams. 

In the fields of business & policy research, social sciences, NGOs, data journalism teams we would like to help with automating data acquisition, processing, validation, auditing, documentation, visualization and presentation workflows, so that they can focus on what humans are best: making sense of the data.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
After the aqui-hire of Candole Partners, I decided to set up a new data driven consultancy / data analytics practice based around music + film industry clients and an ongoing project CEEMID.  

Currently CEEMID is the basis of a loose partnership with partners and we are looking into expanding this into a larger entity.  More information on www.danielantal.eu
profile_positions.title: Experienced management consultant and data scientist

profile_positions.description:
I started a foreign investments consultancy in Budapest with a small team in Budapest, later moved to the Netherlands and associated with Candole Partners, a consultancy that provides market and transaction analysis and advice to firms investing and operating across Central and Southeast Europe.
- Financial and economic planning for transport and energy infrastructure projects (CBA, NPV, IRR, demand, ex ante, ex post evaluations, corporate and EU funded) 
- Management consulting with corporate finance and quantitative methods (NPV, IRR, ROIC, sales forecasting, cost drivers, time series or panel data analysis)
- Regulatory impact assessment, compliance issues, regulatory changes (tariff calculations, impact on revenue, market share, taxation, etc, SCP and competition authority models)
- Supporting foreign direct investment / buy-side clients (market research, target and location selection, due diligence, fair value)
- Experience in managing a small fund with one acquisition, transactional support,  disinvestment.
Experience in transport, energy, media, online publishing, copyrights, insurance.
My company started cooperation with Candole Partners in 2010 and became associated in 2013. 
In Hungary it is chartered as VSG4 Investments and in the Netherlands as Visegrad Investments.
profile_positions.title: Senior consultant (business development and investments)

profile_positions.description:
As Commissioner for Rail Regulation responsible for proposing a policy model and draft legislation for opening the Hungarian railway market for private entry (2005). 

As first executive chairman of the railway regulatory body Hungarian Rail Office (2006-2008). Creating legislative and contractual arrangements for about 20 new entrants (third-party insurance, access rights and pricing, financial assessment of railway undertakings, etc) and to prepare ground for tendered privatizations in the railway cargo business.
profile_positions.title: Railway regulator

profile_positions.description:
After returning from London from a Future Leaders Programme (see education) advisory position in Hungary’s EU accession and economic policy making. 

Professional / advisory responsibilities: economic policy advisor on implementing EU energy and transport liberalization, institution building, oversight of a public sector information projects (ministry of economy and transport), ex-post evaluation of Hungary's government investments, training ex post evaluation unit (national development agency), drafting railway policy option (transport minister) 

Managerial responsibilities: consolidation of governmental information management systems, economic chapter Information Society Strategy of Hungary policy document.
profile_positions.title: Senior advisor, than director

profile_positions.description:
Junior banking consultant at ITCB, a private know-how transfer entity that helped the transformation to a two-tier banking regime in Southeast Europe with vocational training and consulting services. Tasks: training needs assessment, business research in banking, insurance and mortgage markets (opened at that time for foreign investors and privatization). 
On study leave from September 2001.
profile_positions.title: Junior Banking Consultant

profile_positions.description: Seminar on retrieving, analyzing and understanding public economic data for media students.
profile_positions.title: Guest lecturer

profile_positions.description: Starting-up and e-learning and information management company.I was responsible for initial product design, sales and starting up the company.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Trainee at the strategy unit (the company at that time was called Matáv). Introduced into long-term planning, product development and the creation of a daughter company for a multinational, NYSE/BSE listed company. First published paper with my mentor.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

volunteer_experiences.role: Volunteer archivist, donor and founder of charity
volunteer_experiences.description: Fortepan.hu is an open source archive of historic images, collecting from family, private and public collections. It is one of the worlds largest open source archives that make glass plate negatives and historic negatives visible after many decades and available in digital format free of charge for scientific, educational, commercial, private use and creative recreations.  Forte 21 Foundation is a charitable foundation set up to support the maintenance and new acquisitions of Fortepan.
